title: Overpowered Enchantments
description: Extends vanilla enchantments up to level 50 and customizes enchanting costs.
problem: Vanilla Minecraft enchantments are capped at low levels, limiting the potential power players can achieve in end-game scenarios.
solution: Unlocks enchantment limits allowing levels up to 50 and adjusts anvil repair costs to make maintaining overpowered gear viable.

title: Eazzy Server Utils
description: Eazzy Server Utils is a NeoForge mod for Minecraft 1.21.8 that adds essential utilities for multiplayer servers, serving both regular players and staff with categorized commands.
problem: Multiplayer servers often lack quick-access tools for homes, teleports, and admin functions, which slows down gameplay and server management.
solution: The mod offers organized command categories with cooldowns, permission levels, and features like homes, warps, heads, player utils, and staff tools for smooth operations.

title: Compact Villagers
description: A NeoForge mod for Minecraft 1.21.8 that simplifies villager management by allowing storage, infinite trading, and quick trade cycling in one package.
problem: Existing villager-related mods were not fully compatible with NeoForge and required multiple installations for similar functionalities.
solution: Combines villager pickup, infinite trading, and trade cycling into a single, fully NeoForge-compatible mod using native Vanilla rendering.
